context: My lesbian friend and my pansexual friend came over to visit me the other day. They had both recently moved away, the lesbian friend having finally moved in with their partner out of state after ten years of a long distance relationship. But the pansexual friend moved in with their partner after just two months and had already called it quits and moved back just the other day.
